Text:
Classification: Reality
Genre: Family | Lifestyle | Pets/Animals
Status: New Series
Network: BBC THREE ( United Kingdom)

Don't Blame the Dog is a reality series which sees different experts agreeing that bad dog behaviour is down to bad owners and that the owners need to be fixed before the dog can be. Young dog owners with bad attitudes are challenged to spend a week living with people who depend on dogs. some for their survival in difficult environments around the world and others who depend on them for their jobs.


(http://www.tvrage.com/shows/id-31256)
